name.name: brainCOLOR: human brain anatomical labeling protocols and colormaps

software.description: This resource was created to host descriptions of protocols, definitions, and "rules of thumb" for the reliable identification and localization of human brain anatomy and discussions of best practices in brain labeling. The projects related to this resource are on http://binarybottle.github.io/braincolor and https://www.synapse.org/Synapse:syn32072...
